title: Purple Illuminated Spikey Ball Toy 7cm, LED Light-Up Sensory Ball, Multi-Sensory Fun for Play and Relaxation, Rubber Flashing Spiky Sensory Toy for Kids 3+Y
features: Flashing Light-Up Spiky Ball: Includes 1x Purple Spiky Ball with color-changing LED lights. Bounces and lights up in various colors, providing an exciting visual display for kids and adults. Perfect for sensory play, outdoor fun, and interactive games.

Interactive Sensory Toy: The spiky ball features soft, flexible spikes that stimulate tactile senses. Ideal for individuals needing sensory input. Provides a fun, calming experience while also offering stress relief and anxiety reduction through tactile engagement.

Durable and Lightweight Material: Made from high-quality rubber, the Light Up Spiky Ball is portable and reusable. Its durable, soft design makes it ideal for outdoor play in parks, backyards, or any open space, offering hours of enjoyment.

Ideal for Kids 3+ Years: A perfect gift for children aged 3 and up, this flashing spiky ball offers both visual and tactile stimulation. A unique gift idea for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions, sure to entertain and delight kids of all ages.

Great for Stress Relief and Fun: The spiky ball is not just for play; it can also help alleviate stress and anxiety. Its unpredictable bounce and satisfying tactile experience make it a fantastic choice for therapeutic use and interactive fun.
description: Specification: Produc Dimensions: 7cm x 7cm(LxW) Material: Rubber Color: Purple Package Weight: 0.046 (Kg) Packaging: Hang tag Feature: Flashing LED Specification: Color changing effect Description: Dazzling and vibrant spikey ball that lights up with flashing LEDs. Soft and flexible spikes provide a tactile and sensory experience. Eye-catching and mesmerizing light effects with a variety of colors. Durable construction ensures long-lasting playtime fun. Bouncy and unpredictable bounce adds an element of excitement to games. Portable and lightweight design for on-the-go fun. This Spiky Ball is designed with built-in Flashing lights that illuminate when these are bounced. Its user-friendly design makes the Light Up Spiky Balls easy to operate, making them suitable for kids 3+Y.
